hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I build exceptional digital experiences that combine elegant design with robust functionality.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate developer with 4 years of experience in web and mobile development. Specialized in creating robust and scalable applications using best practices and modern technologies.
about.description2: I have experience in both frontend and backend development, always seeking to deliver complete solutions that solve real problems and provide excellent user experience.

project1.title: E-Commerce Platform
project1.description: Complete e-commerce solution with payment integration and admin dashboard.

project2.title: Task Management App
project2.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates.

project3.title: REST API with FastAPI
project3.description: Robust and documented API for business management system.

project4.title: Portfolio Website
project4.description: Modern portfolio website with dark mode, internationalization, and responsive design.

project5.title: Weather Dashboard
project5.description: Beautiful weather dashboard with real-time data, charts, and location-based forecasts.

project6.title: Social Media Clone
project6.description: Full-stack social media application with posts, comments, likes, and user profiles.

project7.title: Mobile Fitness App
project7.description: Cross-platform fitness tracking app with workout plans, progress tracking, and social features.

project8.title: Admin Dashboard
project8.description: Comprehensive admin dashboard with analytics, user management, and data visualization.

project9.title: Microservices API
project9.description: Scalable microservices architecture with service discovery, load balancing, and monitoring.

project10.title: Real-time Chat App
project10.description: Real-time messaging application with group chats, file sharing, and push notifications.

project11.title: E-learning Platform
project11.description: Online learning platform with video courses, progress tracking, and interactive quizzes.

project12.title: Design System
project12.description: Comprehensive design system with reusable components, documentation, and storybook integration.
